comments:
It seems like the as you type validation shouldn't run at all when it's turned
OFF, and it definitely shouldn't be throwing NPEs.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 2005-07-13 10:50:57.83
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Processing Dirty Regions".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.StructuredRegionProcessor.filterTotalScopeRegions(StructuredRegionProcessor.java:168)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.StructuredRegionProcessor.process(StructuredRegionProcessor.java:123)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.internal.reconcile.DirtyRegionProcessor.run(DirtyRegionProcessor.java:412)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)

Note:  I get this quite freqently simply by opening, closing, and reopening the
same WSDL file in quick succession.  I've also been getting it randomly opening
JSP and xml files, as well.  

I tried to raise the priority of this bug to P2 due to the ease and frequency
with which I hit this bug, but it wouldn't let me.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 103867 ***
